gameDesign.description: A first-person shooter where players navigate a derelict space station, battling parasitic aliens while solving environmental puzzles to escape before being consumed.

setting.description: An abandoned, decaying research space station orbiting a gas giant. The station is in partial disrepair, with sections flooded, experiencing gravity fluctuations, and suffering from environmental hazards. It once housed a crew of scientists studying alien organisms, but is now infested with parasitic lifeforms.

characters.description: A lone scavenger who stumbles upon the derelict station while searching for valuable resources. They are resourceful and armed with basic scavenging tools and weaponry.

Various forms of parasitic aliens that have infested the station. They range from small, fast-moving creatures to large, heavily armored brutes. Some can manipulate the environment or infect other lifeforms.
Ghostly echoes of former crew members appear through holographic projections. These provide clues, story fragments, and sometimes, dangerous hints about how to survive and escape.

mechanics: Environmental Puzzle Solving (Repairing systems, Manipulating gravity, Restoring power)
Parasite Weakness Exploitation (Discovering and utilizing specific vulnerabilities of different parasite types)

levels.name: Arrival Bay
levels.description: The initial entry point to the station. Players must restore power to open the airlock and find their first weapon.

levels.name: Research Labs
levels.description: A series of interconnected laboratories where the parasites were originally studied. Contains complex puzzles involving manipulating experiments and restoring environmental controls.

levels.name: Engineering Core
levels.description: The heart of the station's life support systems. Players must repair the core to prevent a station-wide collapse and find a means of escape.
